However, despite his best efforts, Calvin manages to accidentally bump into a local business owner named Janie van der Lee during his awkward interactions with people who don't know him from one another. Janie is initially very surprised and confused about why this local weatherman seems to be bumping into her quite frequently even though they don't know each other from one another. Janie eventually manages to figure out why this local weatherman keeps bumping into her quite frequently even though they don't know each other from one another, which turns out to be because he accidentally bumped into her earlier in the evening during his awkward interactions with people who don't know him from one another.
